The Earth is overcrowded by humans, this is a fact.
If we destroy the nature we destroy ourselves.
What options do we have ?

1. Let the nature do its work by humans like it did before.
Half of the children will die because of diseases but those who survive will produce enough children's to compensate the losses and we will have a stronger human race.
Terrible. Nazis. Fascists.

2. Let us vaccinate all children against all possible diseases.
We create a dishonest and degenerated human race as we have already.
A small minority who owns the money and power will decide in secrecy who should be sterilized and who not. To limit the population increase and to ensure the their loyalty.
We will have a population with disabilities, autists, depressed, drug addicted and allergicals which are fully dependent of the pharmacy.
The half of the USA population or even more falls already in this category.

3. We could try a reasonable third way also and let at least everybody decide if he and his children will get vaccinated or not.
Free will is however not part of the agenda promoted by the ruling class, they would rather exterminate all who are disobedient  to them.
